item.description: WORK EXPERIENCE Bioinformatisist Wright Labs Part-time - Hybrid Aug 2025 - present Analysis of data in R and development of tools for data processing/analysis R • Nextflow • Bioinformatics • Statistics Show extended summary Works focuses primarily on developing tools for researchers (nextflow pipelines, excel functions) and performing statistical analysis. Language Instructor Appalachia Intermediate Unit 8 Part-time - Remote Oct 2025 - present Preparing classes and grading coursework for highschool Japanese I Teaching • Japanese Show extended summary Part-time work giving introductory Japanese lessons to schools with limited foreign language programs in Pennsylvania.
